message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Take it while it's still worth something!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I think we can do better. How about a 55/45 split in my favor? This seems more equitable considering the inflation.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. My turn and I'm taking the 55/45 split you tried to pull.  Last chance, next round it gets worse for both of us!
